subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis made a five-foot birdie putt on his final hole  to give him a one-stroke lead over José Coceres at the midway point of the Booz Allen Classic in Potomac, Md.
snippet: Ben Curtis made a five-foot birdie putt on his final hole  to give him a one-stroke lead over José Coceres at the midway point of the Booz Allen Classic in Potomac, Md.
